headline: Ask HN: Favourite Lesser-Known Alg?
description:
I came across a reference to the Douglas-Peucker line simplification algorithm in the context of lossy compression for GPS tracks. It's a beautiful thing, but not widely known, perhaps? It made me think: what other gems are there that are not part of the standard CS 101 curriculum? Kalman filtering?

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer%E2%80%93Douglas%E2%80%93Peucker_algorithm
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 最喜欢的鲜为人知的阿尔格？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 最喜歡的鮮為人知的阿爾格？
description_zh-Hans:
我在GPS轨迹的有损压缩的背景下，看到一个关于道格拉斯-皮克线简化算法的参考资料。这是一个美丽的东西，但也许并不广为人知？这让我想到：还有哪些不属于标准CS 101课程的瑰宝？卡尔曼滤波？

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer%E2%80%93Douglas%E2%80%93Peucker_algorithm
description_zh-Hant:
我在GPS軌跡的有損壓縮的背景下，看到一個關於道格拉斯-皮克線簡化算法的參考資料。這是一個美麗的東西，但也許並不廣為人知？這讓我想到：還有哪些不屬於標準CS 101課程的瑰寶？卡爾曼濾波？

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramer%E2%80%93Douglas%E2%80%93Peucker_algorithm
